channel.title: intune on Nathan Catania
channel.description: Recent content in intune on Nathan Catania

item.title: Deploy Zscaler Client Connector with Intune (iOS & Android)
item.description: The thoughts and opinions in this post are my own and do not necessarily reflect those of Zscaler. In this guide, we’ll walkthrough how to configure Microsoft Intune from scratch and use it to deploy the Zscaler Client Connector agent (ZCC) - formerly known as Zscaler Client Connector (ZCC). Due to length, I’ve split this into two posts (the orginal was over 8000 words): This post covers deployment on iOS/iPadOS and Android.

item.title: Deploy Zscaler Client Connector with Intune (Windows & macOS)
item.description: The thoughts and opinions in this post are my own and do not necessarily reflect those of Zscaler. In this guide, we’ll walkthrough how to configure Microsoft Intune from scratch and use it to deploy the Zscaler Client Connector agent (ZCC) - formerly known as Zscaler Client Connector (ZCC). Due to length, I’ve split this into two posts (the orginal was over 8000 words): This post covers deployment on Windows and macOS.
